Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(RECREATION TAX)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY FOR THE PARISH OF ST. CHARLES TO LEVY A 10-YEAR 2.97 MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING RECREATION FACILITIES AND PROGRAMS IN SAID PARISH.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. Charles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy a two and ninety-seven hundredths (2.97) mills tax on all property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $2,500,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating recreation facilities and programs in said Parish?

Race.SummaryText:
PARISHWIDE PROPOSITION
(PROGRAMS FOR THE ELDERLY TAX)

SUMMARY:  AUTHORITY FOR THE PARISH OF ST. CHARLES TO LEVY A 10-YEAR .98-MILLS PROPERTY TAX FOR THE PURPOSE OF CONSTRUCTING, IMPROVING, MAINTAINING AND OPERATING FACILITIES AND PROGRAMS FOR THE ELDERLY IN  THE PARISH THROUGH THE ST. CHARLES COUNCIL ON AGING INCORPORATED.
Race.FullText: Shall the Parish of St. Charles, State of Louisiana (the "Parish"), levy and collect a special tax of ninety-eight hundredths (.98) mills on all property subject to taxation in said Parish (an estimated $850,000 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2008 and ending with the year 2017, for the purpose of constructing, improving, maintaining and operating facilities and programs for the elderly in the Parish through the St. Charles Council on Aging Incorporated?
